00024 /*! \file ParameterFileReader.h This file provides interfaces to read a parameter file.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include "calvin_files/parameter/src/ParameterFileData.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <fstream>
00031 #include <string>
00032 //
00033 
00034 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00035 {
00036 
00037 /*! This class provides interfaces to read a parameter file. This version
00038     does not store all of the contents of a parameter file.
00039     Missing items includes the ParameterSet, MetaData and Control
00040     elements.
00041 */
00042 class ParameterFileReader
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         /*! Constructor */
00046         ParameterFileReader();
00047 
00048         /*! Destructor */
00049         ~ParameterFileReader();
00050 
00051 public:
00052         /*! Reads the entire contents of the file.
00053          *
00054          * @param fileName The name of the parameter file to read.
00055          * @param parameterData The parameter data from the input file.
00056          */
00057         bool Read(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterFileData &parameterFileData);
00058 };
00059 
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif // _ParameterFileReader_HEADER_
